summary: The University of Oxford is one of the world's oldest universities, located in England. It started teaching in 1096 and became popular after 1167 when English students were not allowed to study in Paris. Some teachers moved to Cambridge and started a new university there. Oxford has 43 colleges and is known for its unique teaching method with small group tutorials. It has a famous museum, a big library, and the largest university press globally. Oxford is prestigious, with many famous alumni, including UK prime ministers, Nobel Prize winners, and Olympic medalists.
title: University of Oxford
